title: Devouring Love
description: Melody Watts has been in coma or in very deep sleep for two years. No one knows what happened and how it happen. She was just found on the ground unconscious.For two years doctors have tried to wake her up.For two years Merdian, her beloved, has begged her to wake up.For two years Melody has waited for a miracle.For two years the devil has waited for his payment.
author: Serafina Daniel
